  • FaultBuilder

Class FaultBuilder

This class allows to build incrementally a fault composed of segments, or to set the contiguous segments using a Serie (position of points)

Hierarchy

  • FaultBuilder

Index

  • constructor

Accessors

  • fault

Constructors

constructor

  • new FaultBuilder(): FaultBuilder

  • Returns FaultBuilder

Accessors

fault

  • get fault(): Fault

  • Returns Fault

Methods

addPoint

  • addPoint(p: Vector): FaultBuilder
  • example
    const builder = new FaultBuilder()
    // create 2 segments
    builder
         .addPoint([0,0])
         .addPoint([1,0])
         .addPoint([2,1])
         .setBcType(BC.bb)
         .setBurger([1,0])
         .addTo(model)
    // or model.addFault(builder.fault)

    Parameters

    • p: Vector

    Returns FaultBuilder

addTo

  • addTo(model: Model): FaultBuilder

  • Put the current built fault into the provided model

    Parameters

    • model: Model

    Returns FaultBuilder

reset

  • reset(): FaultBuilder

  • Start a new fault construction

    Returns FaultBuilder

  • setBcType(bc: BC): FaultBuilder

  • Parameters

    • bc: BC

    Returns FaultBuilder

setBurger

  • setBurger(burgers: Vectord | Serie<IArray>): FaultBuilder

  • Parameters

    • burgers: Vectord | Serie<IArray>

    Returns FaultBuilder

setBurgersForAxis

  • setBurgersForAxis(axis: Axis, burgers: number | Vectord | Serie<IArray>): FaultBuilder

  • Parameters

    • axis: Axis
    • burgers: number | Vectord | Serie<IArray>

    Returns FaultBuilder

setPoints

  • setPoints(p: Vectord | Serie<IArray>): FaultBuilder

  • Parameters

    • p: Vectord | Serie<IArray>

    Returns FaultBuilder

subdivide

  • subdivide(n?: number): FaultBuilder

  • Subdivide each segment in n sub-segments

    Parameters

    • n: number = 2

    Returns FaultBuilder
